mapper.insert: insert into station (station_id, station_name, province_id, city_id, admin_id, station_phone, station_site, station_remark) values (#{stationId,jdbcType=INTEGER}, #{stationName,jdbcType=VARCHAR}, #{provinceId,jdbcType=VARCHAR}, #{cityId,jdbcType=VARCHAR}, #{adminId,jdbcType=VARCHAR}, #{stationPhone,jdbcType=VARCHAR}, #{stationSite,jdbcType=VARCHAR}, #{stationRemark,jdbcType=VARCHAR})
mapper.update: update station set station_name = #{stationName,jdbcType=VARCHAR}, province_id = #{provinceId,jdbcType=VARCHAR}, city_id = #{cityId,jdbcType=VARCHAR}, admin_id = #{adminId,jdbcType=VARCHAR}, station_phone = #{stationPhone,jdbcType=VARCHAR}, station_site = #{stationSite,jdbcType=VARCHAR}, station_remark = #{stationRemark,jdbcType=VARCHAR} where station_id = #{stationId,jdbcType=INTEGER}
mapper.select: select station_id, station_name, province_id, city_id, admin_id, station_phone, station_site, station_remark from station where station_id = #{stationId,jdbcType=INTEGER}
select station_id, station_name, province_id, city_id, admin_id, station_phone, station_site, station_remark from station
